name: automatisch
tagline: A workflow automation platform for connecting apps with triggers and actions
description: Automatisch is an open-source alternative to Zapier for creating automated workflows between apps. It features a visual editor, triggers, filters, and supports webhook integrations for internal and third-party services.

features.title: REST API
features.description: Open-source workflow automation platform. No subscription fees

features.title: Rich Text Editor
features.description: Drag-and-drop workflow builder. No coding required

features.title: Filter Logic
features.description: Add conditions and filters to workflows. Smart automation

features.title: Webhook Support
features.description: Integrate with any service via webhooks. Universal connectivity

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Run your own automation server. Complete control
